author: fnathan
title: Mesut Ozil enjoys break from Arsenal training as he dines yet again with stunning ‚Äòfriend‚Äô and former Miss Turkey Amine Gulse
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MESUT OZIL is certainly making the most of his extended break from Arsenal, dining out again with stunning ‚Äúfriend‚Äù and ex-Miss Turkey Amine Gulse. 
After the crushing defeat to Bayern Munich, the Gunners midfielder was given extra time off for poor form, wasting no time in popping off to Turkey. Fame Flynet 4 Ozil left an Istanbul eatery with former Miss Turkey Amine Gulse behind 
Before his side‚Äôs 2-0 win over Sutton in the FA Cup on Monday, Ozil shared a picture of himself on a plane on his official Snapchat account. 
A week ago the Germany international, of Turkish descent, was pictured leaving a plush London eatery with the 2014 winner of the Miss Turkey beauty pageant. Fame Flynet 4 They were dining out with pals, but the pair seem to be growing closer A post shared by Amine G√ºl≈üe (@gulseamine) on Sep 23, 2016 at 9:20am PDT 
Swedish born 23-year-old Gulse, who has a Turkish mother and an Iraqi father , has also starred on Turkish TV and said that her and Ozil are just friends. related stories EUROPA LIVE St Etienne vs Manchester United LIVE: Follow all the action, updates and team news from the Europa League round of 32 clash TEAM NEWS Saint Etienne vs Manchester United: What is the team news for the Europa League tie? But Ozil‚Äôs alleged girlfriend, German popstar Mandy Capristo may not be too happy to see them out again as they ate out again with some pals in the Turkish city. 
Ozil‚Äôs current squeeze, Capristo, used to perform in the German pop group Monrose but launched her solo career in 2012. A post shared by Amine G√ºl≈üe (@gulseamine) on Dec 31, 2016 at 9:10am PST A post shared by Amine G√ºl≈üe (@gulseamine) on Aug 24, 2016 at 12:59pm PDT Much like when they were at Novikov in London, Gulse made sure to walk a few feew away from the football star, denying any relationship. 
The midfielder was given extra rest by under-fire boss Arsene Wenger with Arsenal‚Äôs next game not until 4 March against Liverpool at Anfield. üå∑üíó A post shared by Amine G√ºl≈üe (@gulseamine) on Jun 11, 2016 at 5:43am PDT Arsenal star Mesut Ozil stars in the latest advert for Mercedes Benz cars 
The Gunners were due to face Southampton this weekend but the Saints are in the EFL Cup Final against Manchester United on Sunday.
